characterDescription: Stick is just a piece of wood that Shallan tried to Soulcast after her escape from the Wind's Pleasure, but wasn't able to convince it to become fire.

characterDetails.Character: According to Brandon, Stick's telos (i.e., purpose) is to be the best stick it can.
characterDetails.Notes: On April Fool's Day of 2014, Brandon released a supposedly "deleted interlude" from Stick's perspective that can be read here.
